TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadFileCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadFileCompletedEventArgs)
type UploadFileCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * UploadFileCompletedEventArgs -> unit
public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you create a <xref:System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a file.
:::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp" id="Snippet6"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs" id="Snippet6"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb" id="Snippet6":::
The following method is called when the upload completes.
:::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp" id="Snippet7"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs" id="Snippet7"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb" id="Snippet7":::
